r2d3 0.1.0

    Examples

    Examples

    This section shows how to use the exaples available in the https://github.com/d3/d3/wiki/Gallery gallery.

    Bubbles

    Using the example from https://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4063269 requires creating the svg element in d3 instead of HTML as follows:

    var svg = d3.select(r2.root).append("svg")
  .attr("width", r2.width)
  .attr("height", r2.height)
  .attr("font-family", "sans-serif")
  .attr("font-size", "10")
  .attr("text-anchor", "middle");

    and also replacing d3.csv with r2.d3 to render:

    library(r2d3)

flares <- read.csv(system.file("samples/flare.csv", package = "r2d3"))
r2d3(
  flares[!is.na(flares$value), ],
  system.file("samples/bubbles.js", package = "r2d3"),
  version = "4.13.0"
)

    Morley

    https://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4061502

    render(
  read.csv(system.file("samples/morley.csv", package = "r2d3")),
  c(
    system.file("samples/morley.css", package = "r2d3"),
    system.file("samples/morley.js", package = "r2d3")
  ),
  stylesheet = system.file("samples/morley.css", package = "r2d3"),
  version = "4.13.0"
)
